content:
This is the tracker from the Specimen project to add Specimen resource to Group.
FHIR#35972
This topic was moved here from #fmg > For this week's call by Lloyd McKenzie

I'd like to take up the two remaining issues on SMART Web Messaging (FHIR-29368 and FHIR-28468) in a block vote for Feb 21:

Issue Submitter Description Disposition
FHIR-28468 @Jenni Syed Introduce MUST language for smart_messaging_origin Not Persuasive
FHIR-29368 @Matt Varghese I'm struggling with the notion of scratchpad Persuasive with Modification

Please shout if you'd like either of these removed from the block; I'll also include a note on #smart.
Hi co-chairs, would it be possible to add FHIR-36081 to the next agenda please? It is to address feedback from the QA process for R5. Thanks!
Sure. We also need to take up our block vote...
And the tiny Web Messaging block vote too (not need but let's please).

Could we also address https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-36036?
I can't make the meeting myself, but I think it's something we need to fix before the R4B release

I also have a search-related one for Monday if at all possible: FHIR-36095 , to either explicitly prohibit POST-based search in batches or define how to do it (need to know what is possible or not in sections relating to choosing GET vs POST).
